ComicInfo.Summary:
Good Guy Bad Guy Part 1 Eye Chucky: Chucky gets brought back to life by Play Pal Toys and sets his sights on taking over the body of Andy, who is now in the foster care of the Simpson family.
Good Guy Bad Guy Part II School of Hard Knocks: In his quest to take over Andy's body, Chucky murders Andy's foster parents and his teacher and kidnaps Kyle to take him to the foster home where Andy is staying.
Good Guy Bad Guy Part 3 Andy and the Chucky Factory: Chucky stalks Kyle and Andy in a Play Pals Toy Factory.
